article_title: Teen killed after riding mower overturned
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

DESOTO COUNTY, Miss. -- A teenager in DeSoto County was killed in a riding lawn mower accident Tuesday.

The 16-year-old was on a riding lawnmower near Vaiden and Craft Roads when the mower overturned into a culvert full of water.

He was pronounced dead on the scene.

Dick Hackett, a spokesman for the DeSoto County Sheriff's Department told the Commercial Appeal the victim was Barrett Williams was about to enter his senior year in high school.

article_metadata.description: The mower overturned into a culvert filled with water
